Goblin.Desc: The creature is small and scrawny, but is wielding a sort of barbed weapon and is waving it in a theatening matter.
Goblin.Name: Goblin Warrior

Kobold.Desc: This creature is an impish, dragon like spirit that must not be underestimated
Kobold.Name: Kobold Phantom

Myr.Name: Myr
Myr.Desc: This metal being is hip hight, and wields razor sharp claws! Myr's are very skiddish, so plan carefully!
